title: FedericoExbita
author: FedericoExbita
content: I know many of you don't know about Exbita.com, but let me tell you something, it is the best white-label script to launch a cryptocurrency exchange.  Exbita is a white-label script that allows users, entrepreneurs or investors to launch their own cryptocurrency exchange at a totally low price, even having plans managed by the Exbita team. Exbita includes hundreds of features that made it the best script on the marketThis is our new light themeFor Demo go to: demo-light.exbita.comSome benefits of ExbitaFull Trading Api: All public and private endpoints for users to programmatically manage their accounts, trade, and connect external applications.SPA Structure: Loads the frontend once, provides flawless change between pages providing a pleasing browsing experience.Cryptocurrencies Trading: Crypto-to-Crypto, Crypto-to-Fiat Trading.Manage all: Configurable fee, reference bonus, deposit/withdraw limits for each coin/tokens.Ready with Mobile apps: Exbita released with iOS and Android Mobile Apps.Unlimited Markets & Centralized Exchange: Add unlimited markets with crypto-to-crypto and crypto-to-fiat pairs from the admin panel to expand your market as you wish. New currencies you add will start working immediately without additional setup needed. Multi-currency cryptocurrency trading exchange solutions with an unmatched matching engine. All fiat currencies and tokens can be added from the admin panel.Advanced Verification Technologies: Exbita has a KYC and AML verification. The Digital assets are secure with two-factor authentication. Available as Authenticator and SMS code methods.Regulation-safe, external liquidity provider that can fill your markets with orders: Process them in the source exchange, and generate volume even for your token that is not listed anywhere else using the Exbita public API.And the best? Exbita offers the possibility of connecting to liquidity providers such as Binance to fill the order book.  Yes, even for your own token, this is a feature that even without having recurring users you have liquidity in your order book, since the liquidity comes from a third party.It should also be noted that the Exbita team offers recurring updates to maintain a clean and safe environment, adding new functions and fixing possible errors/bugs.In fact, Exbita is one of the best scripts on the market, thanks to its easy installation and its low price.Contact us via our Whatsapp Number: +90 535 062 95 81
